thread.title_full: found it on our last night in Paris! - Review of Le Relais du Louvre, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Susie D
title: found it on our last night in Paris!
text:
had been staying at Novotel Gare de Lyon and checked out as it's location is for business travlers and just had no Paris charm. Found this place for our last night and would highly recommend it. Had a room with three twins for me and my two daughters. simply a gem of a hotel with a great location and so friendly!
Room Tip: can book through her website or also there are two rooms only on Airbnb See more room tips
